EmailTemplate.name: Denied-Funds Exceed 15K Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Request Denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Contact}:
We understand that this is a challenging time for you, and we want to extend our sincerest condolences. Our team is committed to supporting you throughout this process. Upon reviewing your Liquidation Funds request under ticket {!Case.CaseNumber}, We regret to inform you that we were unable to proceed because the disbursement amount is greater that $15,000 and you need to submit a Certificate of Release of Tax Lien.
Once you have it you can submit another request.
If you have any questions, you can contact us at 787-724-3650 or visit one of our branches
We are here to serve you; Banco Popular de Puerto Rico
